entries.3aea655bf660b683: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurately captures the meaning of the Dhammapada verse 1 with natural Vietnamese phrasing."}
entries.14afceec0eeb6117: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurately captures the meaning of verse 2 with natural Vietnamese phrasing."}
entries.19f95e79110460ca: {"accuracy": 2, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "Incorrect translation of verbs. The source describes past actions (insulted, struck, defeated, robbed), but the candidate translates them as imperatives (Don't insult, don't kill)."}
entries.684b24538887635b: {"accuracy": 2, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "Same error as Item 3; translates past grievances as negative imperatives, missing the core meaning of the verse."}
entries.11c79f0b3ee785b6: {"accuracy": 4, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "Accurate meaning, though 't\u00ecnh y\u00eau' (love) is a slightly secular translation for 'averena' (non-hatred/loving-kindness)."}
entries.b71788a3bfc62314: {"accuracy": 2, "fluency": 3, "explanation": "Misinterprets 'yam\u0101mase' (we perish/restrain ourselves) and 'medhag\u0101' (quarrels). The candidate translates 'medhag\u0101' as 'intelligent'."}
entries.3591950d2e7cb886: {"accuracy": 4, "fluency": 3, "explanation": "Mostly accurate, but 't\u00e1n t\u1ec9nh' (flirting) is an odd choice for 'subh\u0101nupassi\u1e43' (contemplating the pleasant)."}
entries.73beb7b8a03881ad: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurate and fluent translation of the verse regarding sense restraint."}
entries.bb092672b0bc6383: {"accuracy": 4, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "Good translation, though it adds 'tham s\u00e2n si' which is an interpretation of 'anikkas\u0101vo' (not free from stains)."}
entries.130e7877558a5d23: {"accuracy": 2, "fluency": 3, "explanation": "Misinterprets 'as\u0101re' (unsubstantial/unreal) as 'people without value' and 'gocar\u0101' (resort/sphere) as 'living among'."}
entries.69c31ea0ac87091a: {"accuracy": 2, "fluency": 3, "explanation": "Same error as Item 11; misinterprets the philosophical concepts of substance/essence as social value."}
entries.2b7bb6f2a904b578: {"accuracy": 3, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "Same error as Item 13; confuses roofing/rain with cleaning/wind."}
entries.a45c86bef0d0125f: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Very accurate and captures the repetitive structure of the Pali verse well."}
entries.5b4b5223e30f31e4: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurate and fluent translation of the verse regarding the joy of merit."}
entries.feb8ff03bb086e44: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurate translation of 'tappati' as 'h\u1ed1i h\u1eadn' (regret/remorse) in this context."}
